name: Franglo
tag_list: classifieds, free-classifieds, expats, expatriates, social-network, web-2-0, travel, whitelabel, community
overview:
Franglo is a user-generated content publishing platform based on the online classifieds model, serving expatriates and internationals around the world.

Franglo was initially launched for the France market, but today franglo is available for dozens of countries around the world. In addition, there are localized sites for many countries including sites for each of France’s 22 administrative regions.

Franglo is pursuing an “Open Platform” strategy, enabling third-party websites and applications to offer franglo content and functionality to their users. The franglo platform can be accessed via a co-branding/white label program, feeds and widgets, as well as a growing library of APIs.

Today, dozens of websites in various countries participate in the franglo co-branding/white label program, including some large expat / international websites. For each partner website, franglo creates and hosts a customized classified ad micro-site “Powered by franglo” that includes the logo, colors, branding, and site navigation of the partner.
